! Title: Viral tweet piggyback list
! Description: Block paid tweets that promote useless products on the replies of viral tweets
! Expires: 4 days
! Homepage: https://github.com/xetera/this-tweet-took-off

! Ad providers
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(bit.ly/octoplushies))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(mood-plushies.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(squishplushies.com))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(beachybreezyjewelry.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(oceangalaxy.co/product))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(oceangalaxylight.shop/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(apollo-lightings.myshopify.com))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(hellacomfy.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(sunsetic.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(shothomie.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(firebox.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(dentrie.com))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(coolthingscafe.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(suctional.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(loxxry.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(luxuryrealfr.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(thedetoxmask.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(owlprojector.com/))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(instagram.com/sayhelloforsho))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(dimesso.com/remover))
! Ad keywords
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(egyptcandles@gmail.com))
! Banned promoters
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(twitter.com/Hella_Comfy))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(twitter.com/TheGreenTeaMask))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(twitter.com/nowthatscoolll))
twitter.com##article[data-testid='tweet']:has(a:has-text(twitter.com/Kamirahpayne))
